member.name: T:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.ResizeMode
member.summary: Determines the resize mode while dragging the splitter bar.

member.name: F:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.ResizeMode.Default
member.summary: Resizes the panels size only when release the mouse button of dragging action.

member.name: F:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.ResizeMode.Continuous
member.summary: Resizes the panels size instantly while dragging the splitter bar.

member.name: F:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.ResizeMode.Incremental
member.summary: Resizes the panels size in particular span.

member.name: T:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter
member.summary: C1WebSlitter is a container control that consists a movable bar that divides a container's display area into two resizable panels.

member.summary: For internal use only.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.

member.summary: This member overrides Control.TrackViewState.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.Bar
member.summary: Gets a SplitterBar object that defines the information for splitter bar.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.Panel1
member.summary: Gets the SplitterPanel object that defines the information for top or left panel of splitter.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.Panel2
member.summary: Gets the SplitterPanel object that defines the information for bottom or right panel of splitter.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.AutoResize
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to resize the panels automatically while the container's size change.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.ResizeMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the resize mode while dragging the splitter bar.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.Increment
member.summary: Gets or sets the movement span of incremental resizing.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.SplitterDistance
member.summary: Gets or sets the location of the splitter, in pixels, from the left or top edge of the C1WebSplitter.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the horizontal or vertical orientation of the C1WebSplitter panels.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called at client side when start dragging the splitter.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientSized
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called at client side when finish dragging the splitter.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientSizing
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called at client side when dragging the splitter.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientCollapse
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called before panel1 is collapsed.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientCollapsed
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called when panel1 is collapsed by clicking the collapse/expand image.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientExpand
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called before panel1 is expanded out.

member.name: P:C1.Web.C1WebSplitter.C1WebSplitter.OnClientExpanded
member.summary: Gets or sets the javascript function name that would be called when panel1 is expanded out by clicking the collapse/expand image.
